amendment.description: To prevent and, if necessary, respond to an international outbreak of the avian flu.

vote.text: Amendment SA 159 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 159 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Obama. (consideration: CR S2930-2932; text: CR S2930) To prevent and, if necessary, respond to an international outbreak of the avian flu.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 159 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 159 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Obama.
